ResourceHeader.Description: The Auckland Ionosonde station near Auckland, New Zealand, had a IPS 4D digital Ionosonde between 1992 and 1998, after a IPS-42 ionosonde was in operation between 1983 and 1994(perhaps). The Auckland hourly scaled data and median data of foF2 and M(3000)F2 are available since 01/1967 to 12/1978. However, no Ionosonde information between 1967 and 1978 is available. See details at http://www.sws.bom.gov.au/World_Data_Centre/2/1/16
